description: Quantum-inspired intelligence processing and quantum-based reasoning for LUKHAS QI core
purpose: Provides quantum intelligence processing capabilities, quantum-inspired reasoning algorithms, and core quantum intelligence functionality

capabilities.name: quantum_processing
capabilities.description: Quantum-inspired intelligence processing using superposition and entanglement concepts

capabilities.name: qi_core
capabilities.description: Core quantum intelligence algorithms and data structures

capabilities.name: quantum_reasoning

quality_guarantees.input_validation: All quantum states are validated for normalization and dimensionality
quality_guarantees.error_handling: Graceful degradation on quantum operation failures
quality_guarantees.type_safety: Full type annotations with quantum-specific types
quality_guarantees.thread_safety: Read-only operations are thread-safe, write operations use locking
